label: Harmonised participant clinical metadata
description: Harmonised metadata submitted by the data provider
date the record (participant) was submitted by the data provider
name of the data provider as defined by the IMDHub providers list
the identifier that is used within the data provider's system
an identifier that links the participant to an organisation
date the record was created within the data provider's system
date the record was last modified within the data provider's system
an indication that the participant have consent within the data provider's system
the date informed consent was given

columnName: has agreed to recontact of incidental findings
label: Incidental findings of subject

description: indication that the participant has agreed that their data can be reused in the future

columnName: has agreed to recontact for future research
description: indication that the participant has agreed that they can be contacted for future research

columnName: has agreed to shared family tree
label: Consent for shared family tree
description: indication that the participant has agreed to sharing their family tree
the month the participant was born
the year the participant was born
ISO country name that indicates the current residence of the participant
ISO country name that indicates the current residence of the participant's father
ISO country name that indicates the current residence of the participant's mother
